lead_paragraph: COHN--J. Gunther. 3/11 - 3/24/08 Global warming would be of great concern. As a scientist, you devoted your career to improving our environment. Your inventions include the Catalytic Converter, used to purify the air from car exhausts, worldwide. Dad, you are missed by family, friends, colleagues and mostly by your daughter Vicki. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  COHN, J. GUNTHER. 3
